Name: Data Value
Label: vd
Note:
(*) Data Value is a base64-encoded string with the
        URL-safe alphabet as defined in Section 5 of [RFC4648], with padding omitted. (In CBOR, the octets in the Data Value are encoded using a definite-length byte string, major type 2.)

Name: LwM2M Object Link
Label: vlo
